item.title: Update #1:
item.description:
A small update on my small project. (￣o￣) . z Z

Every day is torture and reflection on unrealized ideas. But you have to look at life more optimistically and improve yourself every day.

What’s the point of existing if you can’t find the strength to do what you want? There is nothing worse than living paycheck to paycheck, destroying your mind and body in your free time, telling yourself – “I deserve rest, I worked so much and I can afford it”
But your j*b is already destroying your body. There is nothing good about working for someone else without improving yourself, only to retire at 60 with a broken body.
